inclusion.criterion: Three months of history of pain and disability of the shoulder
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Failure to conservative initial treatment with NSAID's and rehabilitation
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Previous shoulder surgeries of any kind
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Metabolic disease like diabetes mellitus or rheumatoid arthritis
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Previous infiltration in the past sixth months
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 14-year-old boy with scoliosis and back pain, no other medical conditions. Candidate for scoliosis surgery.
